snippet: Roger Federer, playing his first match in more than two months after a knee operation, cruised to a 6-3, 6-4 victory over Guillermo García-López in the second round of the Monaco Masters.
abstract: Roger Federer beats Guillermo Garcia-Lopez in second round at Monaco Masters.
lead_paragraph: Roger Federer, playing his first match in more than two months after a knee operation, cruised to a 6-3, 6-4 victory over Guillermo García-López in the second round of the Monaco Masters.
